name: get_scan_id
description:
This is a sub-function API for tool weblasso.
Tool description: Scan the web for a diverse range of data including subdomains, IP Addresses, web technologies and emails!
API description: Run a scan against a target URL and receive a scan ID to obtain scan results or check scan status at a later time.

Provide an optional callback URL to receive scan results automatically once the scan is completed (ensure that the callback URL accepts POST requests)

target.description: The URL of the target to be scanned.

callback_url.description: The URL to receive the scan results automatically via a POST request upon scan completion. Defaults to 'https://my-callback-url.com'.
